forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
